description: Concentration driven historical forcing with land use held constant at 1850 usage.  Same as the concentration driven CMIP6 historical experiment except with land use and land cover change (LULCC) held constant at pre-industrial conditions. Additional ensemble members are requested with tier 2 priority.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 1, Tier 2, Historical, pre-industrial Land Use and Land Cover, 1850 LULCC
rationale: Land-use change impact on past climate.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Constant pre-industrial (1850) land-use forcing. Land use should not change in the control run and should be fixed according to reconstructed agricultural maps from 1850.  Due to the diversity of model approaches in Earth System Models for land carbon, some groups might deviate from this specification, this must be clearly documented.
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Land Use

requirements.description: Apply all transient historical forcings that are relevant for the land surface model. Include transient CO2, Nitrogen deposition, aerosol deposition and population density etc.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, historical, land surface forcing, all forcings
requirements.label: All historical land surface forcings

requirements.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Time varying global annual mean concentrations for CO2 and other long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

requirements.canonical_name: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations
requirements.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
requirements.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Historical solar particle forcing (1850-2014). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Historical, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Historical Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration

requirements.description: All applicable land management active in the land surface model configuration.
